metadata.synopsis: One of the flaming fists in Haven. Resting after an expedition to SCL.

0.speaker: Fist Gretta
0.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.NodeContext: solemn

1.speaker: Fist Gretta
1.text: Good work rooting out the traitor.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: 'the traitor' was a cultist disguised as a flaming fist that the player killed

2.speaker: Fist Gretta
2.text: Nice to see a friendly face come out of the shadows for once.
2.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.

3.speaker: Fist Gretta
3.text: That parasite of yours could prove useful. Until it kills you.
3.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.NodeContext: second sentence delivered grimly - it's not a joke
